contentTypes.name: Home Page
contentTypes.description: This is the main hero/ intro text that is displayed on the Home Page of the web app. e.g. Discover methods used by the Office for National Statistics.

contentTypes.name: Methods Table and Summary
contentTypes.description: This is the content model for adding a new method to the catalogue.

contentTypes.name: Methods Catalogue Page
contentTypes.description: The content model for the methods catalogue page.

contentTypes.name: Help Centre
contentTypes.description: This is the content model for adding new content to the help centre page.

validations.message: Please select a category from the drop down menu

contentTypes.name: Privacy Page
contentTypes.description: This field contains the content of the privacy protection page.

contentTypes.name: About Page
contentTypes.description: This is the content model for displaying content on the about page. This uses Markdown (enables you to embed links etc onto the page).

contentTypes.name: Help Centre Structure
contentTypes.description: This is the content model which describes the layout of the help centre landing page.

contentTypes.name: Help Centre Method Request
contentTypes.description: Customised template for the methods request page in the help centre
